snippet.title: Creme de la Creme
snippet.description:
https://www.choiceofgames.com/creme-de-la-creme

Climb to the very top of the class at your exclusive private school for socialites! Will you study hard, find a perfect match, or embrace scandal?


Crème de la Crème is an interactive novel by Hannah Powell-Smith where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based, 440,000 words without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.


When your parents fall into disgrace it's up to you to enroll at Gallatin College, to secure your future and restore the family's good name. Gallatin is a "finishing school" where young people learn social graces, surrounded by their high-class peers.


You'll dance with royalty, impress decorated officers, and perfect your etiquette. 

But are you a rake soaked in scandal, or a perfectly proper socialite? Sneaking out of class or polishing your ballroom dancing, either way: the road to high society starts here!


Will you be the crème de la crème?
